title: Nicole Leatherman
author: Nicole Leatherman
description: Nicole believes in the Hippocratic philosophy, "Let food be thy medicine," and her passion is creating content that helps others learn about self-healing through eating real foods and living an intentionally balanced life.
cleaned_text: and What Are Its Benefits? If you think ghee is butter, you are partially right. Ghee is a form of butterfat, but it's not the same thing as the long, yellow stick that mom used to serve on baked potato night. Discover exactly what ghee is, as well as the potential benefits it churns out.
